Question & Options:
What is *Dragonball Evolution* loosely based on?
Options:
A. A Japanese anime series
B. A Japanese dragon ball manga series created by Akira Toriyama
C. A video game adaptation
D. A science fiction novel
Correct Answer: A Japanese dragon ball manga series created by Akira Toriyama

Question & Options:
What is the significance of Dragonball Evolution in relation to the Dragon Ball series?
Options:
A. It is the first official live-action adaptation of the Dragon Ball series.
B. It was directed by a famous anime creator.
C. It features multiple versions of Piccolo.
D. It was released as a direct sequel to the anime.
Correct Answer: It is the first official live-action adaptation of the Dragon Ball series.
